alert.note: Alert for Berks; Eastern Montgomery; Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 6:40AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN BERKS...MONTGOMERY...WEST CENTRAL BUCKS AND NORTHEASTERN CHESTER COUNTIES... At 639 AM EST, a snow shower was located near Birdsboro, or 9 miles east of Reading, moving east at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Reading, Norristown, Pottstown, Phoenixville, Lansdale, West Norriton, East Norriton, Wyomissing, Quakertown, Perkasie, Souderton, Birdsboro, Collegeville, Royersford, Fleetwood, Sinking Spring, Laureldale, Trappe, Hatfield, and East Greenville. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 331 and 332. Northeast Extension between mile markers 23 and 43. Interstate 176 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 7 and 11. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for slick surfaces. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Berks; Eastern Montgomery; Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery
